thread.title: Toddler dies, another critically injured at flat in London
thread.title_full: Toddler dies, another critically injured at flat in London

author: Jen
title: Toddler dies, another critically injured at flat in London
text:
(Picture: Twitter/London 999) Two children, both aged one, were found critically injured at a flat in London, with one later dying in hospital. 
Police arrived at the flat in London around 11.10pm last night and found both the toddlers seriously injured.
The boy died later that night and the girl remains in a critical condition.
Rugby player returns to game after being told he'd never walk again Detectives from the Homicide and Major Crime Command are investigating.
An investigation in ongoing into what happened at the property in Wilberforce Road in Hackney, near Finsbury Park.
 
Next of kin have been informed although a formal identification has not yet taken place.
There have been not yet been any arrests.
Police asked anyone with information to contact the incident room on 020 8345 3775.
More follows.
